title: Computer Literacy Enhancement Course for Digital Immigrants

context.prior_knowledge: No or minimal computer usage experience
context.additional_context: A course targeting current professionals in mathematical job fields, aiming to improve basic computer literacy and employment competencies through digital device support

learning_goals: Learners can independently perform basic computer operations (file management, internet searches, etc.) after completing 40 hours of training
Learners can perform mathematical calculations and data visualization tasks using spreadsheets with over 80% accuracy
Learners can complete mathematics problem-solving projects using online collaboration tools (e.g., cloud document sharing)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
